Name: BladeShield
About the game: BladeShield is an action-packed, VR sci-fi game that makes full use of room-scale VR and tracked controllers. Use your military grade BladeShields to fight off successive waves of rogue A.I. enemies -- including sawbots, blaster bots, and mega turrets. Charge up your BladeShields to unleash a devastating EMP blast! How long can you last in this futuristic survival game? Wield a killer combination of lethal energy blade and proton shield. Slice and dice your way through unending waves of A.I. enemies. Fight against droves of murderous machines -- including sawbots, blaster bots, jump bots, and mega turrets. Customize the look of your electroluminescent light blades. Charge up to unleash devastating EMP blasts!
